Numbers of RAM blocks.

simplesect.para: RAM blocks must be used in nRF51. In newer SoCs, RAM is divided into segments and this functionality is not supported. See the PS for mapping between the internal RAM and RAM blocks, because this mapping is not 1:1, and functions related to old style blocks must not be used.

briefdescription.para: Masks of RAM blocks.

Task for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to subscribe events.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the subscribe configuration for a given POWER task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the publish configuration for a given POWER event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
Channel through which to publish the event.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the publish configuration for a given POWER event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the reset reason bitmask.

detaileddescription.para: This function returns the reset reason bitmask. Unless cleared, the RESETREAS register is cumulative. A field is cleared by writing '1' to it (see nrf_power_resetreas_clear). If none of the reset sources is flagged, the chip was reset from the on-chip reset generator, which indicates a power-on-reset or a brown out reset.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The mask of reset reasons constructed with nrf_power_resetreas_mask_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the selected reset reason field.

detaileddescription.para: This function clears the selected reset reason field.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The mask constructed from nrf_power_resetreas_mask_t enumerator values.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting power status of the LTE Modem domain.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
The LTE Modem domain is powered on.
The LTE Modem domain is powered off.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the RAMSTATUS register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: Value with bits set according to the masks in nrf_power_ramblock_mask_t.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the power failure comparator configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if the power failure comparator is to be enabled, false otherwise.
Voltage threshold value.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the power failure comparator configuration.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Function sets this boolean variable to true if power failure comparator is enabled. The pointer can be NULL if we do not need this information.

simplesect.para: Threshold setting for power failure comparator.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the VDDH power failure comparator threshold.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Threshold to be set.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the VDDH power failure comparator threshold.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: VDDH threshold currently configured.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the general purpose retention register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
General purpose retention register number.
Value to be set in the register.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting general purpose retention register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
General purpose retention register number.

simplesect.para: Value from the register.

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable DCDC converter.

simplesect.para: If the device consist of high voltage power input (VDDH), this setting will relate to the converter on low voltage side (1.3 V output).

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if DCDC converter is to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the state of the DCDC converter.

simplesect.para: If the device consist of high voltage power input (VDDH), this setting will relate to the converter on low voltage side (1.3 V output).

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Converter is enabled.
Converter is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Turn ON sections in the selected RAM block.

detaileddescription.para: This function turns ON several sections in one block and also block retention.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
RAM block index.
Mask of the sections created by merging nrf_power_rampower_mask_t flags.

briefdescription.para: Turn ON sections in the selected RAM block.

detaileddescription.para: This function turns OFF several sections in one block and also block retention.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
RAM block index.
Mask of the sections created by merging nrf_power_rampower_mask_t flags.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the ON mask and retention sections in the selected RAM block.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
RAM block index.

simplesect.para: Mask of sections state composed from nrf_power_rampower_mask_t flags.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling or disabling the DCDC converter on VDDH.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if DCDC converter on VDDH is to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the state of DCDC converter on VDDH.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Converter is enabled.
Converter is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the main supply status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The current main supply status.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the whole USBREGSTATUS register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.

simplesect.para: The USBREGSTATUS register value. Use nrf_power_usbregstatus_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the VBUS input detection status.

detaileddescription.para: USBDETECTED and USBREMOVED events are derived from this information

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
VBUS voltage below valid threshold.
VBUS voltage above valid threshold.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the state of the elapsed time for the USB supply output settling.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
USBREG output settling time not elapsed.
USBREG output settling time elapsed (same information as USBPWRRDY event).

briefdescription.para: Function for checking whether the specified ABB domain is busy.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of ABB domain.
The ABB is busy with applying the new operating point.
The ABB is ready to accept the new operating point.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting configuration of the operating point for the specified ABB domain.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of ABB domain.
Pointer to the structure with configuration to be set.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting configuration of the operating point for the specified ABB domain.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of ABB domain.
Pointer to the structure with configuration to be set.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the force lock for the specified ABB domain.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of ABB domain.
True if force lock is to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the force lock for the specified ABB domain is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of ABB domain whose status is checked.
Force lock is enabled.
Force lock is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling specified voltage regulator.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of voltage regulators to be enabled. Use nrf_power_vreg_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling specified voltage regulator.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of voltage regulators to be disabled. Use nrf_power_vreg_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the specified voltage regulator is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Mask of voltage regulator to be checked. Use nrf_power_vreg_mask_t values for bit masking.

simplesect.para: Mask of enabled voltage regulators.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the Ultra Low Power (ULP) mode.

simplesect.para: Going into ULP mode is allowed only if this mode is enabled - otherwise it is blocked. If the ULV mode is blocked, the ULP mode is also blocked.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if ULP mode is to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the ULP mode is enabled.

simplesect.para: Going into ULP mode is allowed only if this mode is enabled - otherwise it is blocked. If the ULV mode is blocked, the ULP mode is also blocked.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
ULP mode is enabled.
ULP mode is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the Ultra Low Voltage (ULV) mode.

simplesect.para: Going into ULP mode is allowed only if this mode is enabled - otherwise it is blocked. If the ULV mode is blocked, the ULP mode is also blocked.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if ULV mode is to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the ULV mode is enabled.

simplesect.para: Going into ULP mode is allowed only if this mode is enabled - otherwise it is blocked. If the ULV mode is blocked, the ULP mode is also blocked.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
ULV mode is enabled.
ULV mode is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the POWER semaphore status.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Semaphore is acquired.
Semaphore is released.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting BILS instances.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if all configured BILS instances are to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if BILS instances are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
All configured BILS instances are enabled.
All BILS instances are disabled.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the PMIC interface.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
True if PMIC interface is to be enabled, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the PMIC interface is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
PMIC interface is enabled.
PMIC interface is disabled.

briefdescription.para: Symbol indicating whether Constant Latency mode is present.
Symbol indicating whether Low-Power mode is present.
Symbol indicating whether sleep events are present.
Symbol indicating whether the POWER peripheral controls the USB regulator.
Symbol indicating whether DCDCEN for REG0 is present.
Symbol indicating whether DCDCEN for REG1 is present.
Symbol indicating whether power failure event is present.
Symbol indicating whether power failure comparator is present.
Symbol indicating whether power failure comparator for VDDH is present.
Symbol indicating whether RESETREAS register is present in POWER.
Symbol indicating whether RESETREAS CTRLAP is present.
Symbol indicating whether RESETREAS LPCOMP is present.
Symbol indicating whether RESETREAS NFC is present.
Symbol indicating whether RESETREAS VBUS is present.
Symbol indicating whether MAINREGSTATUS register is present.
Symbol indicating whether GPREGRET register is present.
Symbol indicating whether GPREGRET register is treated as an array.
Size of GPREGRET register when defined as array.
Symbol indicating whether semaphore for regulator voltage scaling procedure is present.
Symbol indicating whether task and event responsible for updating voltage regulators configuration are present.
Symbol indicating whether voltage regulators are configurable.
Symbol indicating whether the Adaptive Body Biasing (ABB) domains are present.
Symbol indicating whether the power block modes are present.
Symbol indicating whether the Built-in Leakage Sensors (BILS) are present.
Symbol indicating whether the Power Management IC (PMIC) is present.
Symbol specifying the maximum number of available ABB_LOCK events.
Hardware access layer for managing the POWER peripheral.
